author: Ben Otto
title: Deadly Standoff Ends in Indonesia as Police Storm Terrorist Detention Center
text:
JAKARTA, Indonesiaâ€”A deadly standoff at an Indonesian detention center for terrorist inmates, including Islamic State supporters, ended after 36 hours when police stormed the facility Thursday.
Police said 156 inmates took part in a revolt at the center, which houses suspected terrorists standing trial and convicted terrorists awaiting transfer into the regular prison system. One died in fighting with police early on, and 145 returned to custody one-by-one early Thursday after a police ultimatum to surrender by daybreak.
